snippet: Apple, which said it was making the new U2 album available free to about 500 million iTunes customers, says 26 million people downloaded the entire album.
abstract: Apple, which said it was making the new U2 album available free to about 500 million iTunes customers, says 26 million people downloaded the entire album.

headline.main: Apple Releases Download Numbers for Free U2 Album
headline.print_headline: Apple Releases Numbers On U2 Downloads
